==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|く|み|と|k3=ど|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
Compound of the verb {{m|ja|組む||tr=kumu|unite}} in adverbial form and the noun {{m|ja|処||tr=to|place}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|くみど}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=くみど}} a couples bedroom
#* 712: {{w|Kojiki}}
#*: 雖然'''久美度'''邇<small>此四字以音。</small>興而生子、水蛭子。
